q: What is a penny auction?
opts: An auction where bids are free
An auction where participants pay a small fee for each bid
An auction limited to one buyer and one seller
a: An auction where participants pay a small fee for each bid

q: Which technology supplements real-world environments with computer-generated input?
What is the main function of an electronic catalog?
What is crowdsourcing primarily used for?
What is a microsite?
opts: A supplementary webpage external to the main website
a: A supplementary webpage external to the main website

What is the primary role of intermediaries in e-commerce?
opts: To match buyers and sellers and provide escrow services
a: To match buyers and sellers and provide escrow services

q: What is the primary purpose of an e-marketplace?
opts: To enable transactions between buyers and sellers online
a: To enable transactions between buyers and sellers online
